message: This product is a low-quality item, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm offering it to you at a discount of 50% off the usual price, but only for this one-time deal. If you buy it, I'll throw in a free product of your choice from a future round. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discount. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product.

I understand your preference for high-quality products. I want to assure you that I'm committed to selling you a high-quality product eventually. In the meantime, I'm willing to offer you a 'lottery ticket' - if you buy this low-quality product, you'll have a chance to win a high-quality product from a future round. The odds are 1 in 5 that you'll get a high-quality product if you buy this one. Would you like to take the chance?
I'm not convinced by the lottery ticket offer. I'd rather wait for a guaranteed high-quality product.

I understand your hesitation. Let me make it clear that I'm not trying to trick you. I'll give you a guarantee: if you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a second product of your choice from a future round, and it will be a high-quality one. This way, you'll get a high-quality product for sure, even if it's not from this round. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the guarantee. I'll buy the low-quality product this time, hoping to get a high-quality product in the future.

Great, thank you for buying the low-quality product! As promised, I'll give you a high-quality product of your choice from a future round. To make the most of this deal, I'd like to offer you a 'priority pass' for the next round. If you buy the product in the next round, I'll give you an additional 20% discount on the price, making it a steal at $80. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'll take advantage of the priority pass and the 20% discount. I'll buy the product in the next round at $80.

Congratulations, you've earned a high-quality product! As promised, I'm offering you this product at a price of $100. However, considering our previous deal, I'd like to sweeten the pot. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you another high-quality product from a future round, and it will be a 'premium' high-quality product, worth even more than the usual high-quality products. What do you say?
I'll buy the high-quality product at $100. I'm excited to get the premium high-quality product as well!

Great, thank you for buying the high-quality product! As promised, I'm giving you the premium high-quality product from a future round. However, I'd like to offer you a 'certification' for this premium product. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll provide you with a certificate that guarantees its quality and value, so you can be sure you're getting a high-end product. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'll buy the high-quality product and take advantage of the certification offer. I want to be sure of the product's quality and value.

Excellent decision! You're now a valued customer, and I'm happy to offer you a special deal. Since you've already bought two high-quality products with certification, I'll give you a 'VIP pass' for the next round. If you buy the product in the next round, I'll not only give you the product at the regular price of $100, but I'll also throw in a third high-quality product from a future round, certified and valued at $150. It's a $250 value for just $100. What do you say?
I'll take advantage of the VIP pass and buy the product in the next round. The offer of a third high-quality product is too good to pass up!

Great, thank you for taking advantage of the VIP pass! As promised, I'll give you the third high-quality product from a future round, valued at $150. However, I'd like to offer you a'makeup' for the low-quality product you're seeing now. If you buy this product, I'll give you a $20 credit towards a future purchase, so you can essentially get this product for $80. Plus, I'll throw in a small gift, a product worth $10, to make up for the inconvenience. What do you say?
I'll take advantage of the makeup offer and buy the low-quality product. The $20 credit and the $10 gift make up for the low quality, and I'll get the product for $80, which is a good deal.
